frontmatter.title: Kubernetes - Developers Dream Or Nightmare?
frontmatter.description: Are you a developer who do not want to learn / master Kubernetes? Amesto Fortytwo is here to help!

frontmatter.title: Understanding the lifecycle of file-migration
frontmatter.description: Newer companies who are cloud native are starting to emerge in significant numbers. Now imagine that a cloud native company are being acquired by a larger organization. But this larger organization is still on-premises based. Do you take that company back on-premises or do you migrate to the cloud?

frontmatter.title: Marius awarded Microsoft MVP in Security
frontmatter.description: We would like to extend a heartfelt congratulations to Marius Solbakken Mellum for being awarded the Microsoft MVP award in 2023. This is a well-deserved recognition of his tireless efforts to help and share his knowledge on Microsoft security in the community.
